about: Hi, I'm Vaibhav, a full stack developer passionate about building impactful digital products.
projectDatabase: In this project I explored and applied Java persistence concepts using Hibernate and JPA, including automated entity generation, connection pooling with Hikari, and data operations via Jakarta Data Repositories.
containerTechnology: In this project I explored containerization concepts using Docker and Podman by deploying a FastAPI-React application with PostgreSQL, focusing on volumes, multi-stage builds, and network configurations.
javaFundamentals: In this project I explored core Java concepts such as multithreading, logic operators, and version-specific features from Java 17, 21, and 25.
